AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

getUSDDecimals().details: Retrieves the number of decimal places for USD.

returns._0: The number of decimal places for USD.

parseVaultAsset(uint256,uint8).details: Parses the vault asset amount by adjusting the number of decimal places.

params.amount: The original asset amount in vault.
params.originDigits: The number of decimal places for the original asset.

parseVaultAssetSigned(int256,uint8).details: This library contains utility functions for transferring assets.

params.amount: The amount of assets to transfer in integer format with decimal precision.
params.collateralTokenDigits: The decimal precision of the collateral token.

returns._0: The transferred asset amount converted to integer with decimal precision for the USD stablecoin. This function is internal and can only be accessed within the current contract or library.

transferIn(address,address,address,uint2.details: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from a given address to another address.

params._from: The address from which the tokens will be transferred.
params._to: The address to which the tokens will be transferred.
params._tokenAmount: The amount of tokens to be transferred.
